text: Anthurium grex-avium is a species of plant in the family Araceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador grex-avium Category:Near threatened plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1978
title: Anthurium grex-avium
